items.content_html: A lightweight event-driven microservices package for RabbitMQ in Node.js. Enables asynchronous communication, message publishing and consuming, and scalable event-driven architecture. Perfect for distributed systems and real-time applications.

items.content_html: FDECODE is a powerful and lightweight web-based tool designed for encoding, decoding, and hashing various formats with ease. Built with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and enhanced using jQuery and Tailwind CSS, this tool ensures a seamless and responsive user experience.

Built with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and enhanced using jQuery and Tailwind CSS, this tool ensures a seamless and responsive user experience.

items.content_html: Blue Watchdog is your vigilant guardian against unreliable APIs. This lightweight yet powerful package monitors endpoints for errors, latency spikes, and availability, automatically triggering circuit breakers to prevent system meltdowns. Perfect for microservices, third-party API integrations, or critical backend routes.
items.title: walele993/blue_watchdog: Blue Watchdog is your vigilant guardian against unreliable APIs. This lightweight yet powerful package monitors endpoints for errors, latency spikes, and availability, automatically triggering circuit breakers to prevent system meltdowns. Perfect for microservices, third-party API integrations, or critical backend routes.

items.content_html: A lightweight, fast API server built with Nitro that includes Swagger documentation, theme support, and example endpoints. You can use this project to accompany your nuxtJs that is configured as static, or you can use it for other api server purposes.
